gāo
cake
торт
rtega_mnemonic:
糕糕RScakes, pastry, steamed dumplings
  • cake made from rice 米 which is cooked like a lamb on fire 羔
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 羔 indicates the sound; 米 (rice) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蛋糕 [ dàn gāo ]: cake; Classifiers: 块
糟糕 [ zāo gāo ]: too bad; how terrible; what bad luck; terrible; bad
糕点 [ gāo diǎn ]: cakes; pastries
年糕 [ nián gāo ]: nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
雪糕 [ xuě gāo ]: frozen treat
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 米 [ mǐ ] rice, millet, grain
    • 羔 [ gāo ] lamb
heisig_chinese_memo: What's perfect after cooking rice and sheep over a cooking fire?  Cake of course!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: What's perfect after cooking rice and sheep over a cooking fire?  Cake of course!
humanum_full_description_en: From the sound of " rice " to " lamb ", it means food made with rice flour, flour or soybean flour. Song Meng Yuan, "Tokyo Dream Hualu-Double Ninth Festival": "One or two days ago, each steamed noodle cake was left behind, and a small ribbon-cutting flag was placed on it...and the powder was used as a lion king and placed on the cake. "Lion Man"." Chapter 41 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "Aunt Xue only picked a piece of cake, and Mother Jia picked a paper."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " rice " and " lamb ", it means food made with rice flour, flour or soybean flour.
humanum_full_description: 從「米」，「羔」聲，表示用米粉、麵粉或豆粉製成的食品。宋孟元老《東京夢華錄‧重陽》：「前一二日，各以粉麵蒸糕遺送，上插剪綵小旂……又以粉作獅子蠻王之狀，置於糕上，謂之『獅蠻』。」《紅樓夢》第41回：「薛姨媽只揀了一塊糕，賈母揀了一個卷子。」
humanum_short_description: 從「米」，「羔」聲，表示用米粉、麵粉或豆粉製成的食品。

從「 米 」，「 羔 」聲，表示用米粉、麵粉或豆粉製成的食品。宋孟元老《東京夢華錄‧重陽》：「前一二日，各以粉麵蒸糕遺送，上插剪綵小旂……又以粉作獅子蠻王之狀，置於糕上，謂之『獅蠻』。」《紅樓夢》第41回：「薛姨媽只揀了一塊糕，賈母揀了一個卷子。」
From the sound of " rice" to " lamb", it means food made with rice flour, flour or soybean flour. Song Meng Yuan, "Tokyo Dream Hualu-Double Ninth Festival": "One or two days ago, each steamed noodle cake was left behind, and a small ribbon-cutting flag was placed on it...and the powder was used as a lion king and placed on the cake. "Lion Man"." Chapter 41 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "Aunt Xue only picked a piece of cake, and Mother Jia picked a paper."

糕字的基本解释

糕
gāo
用米粉或面粉搀和其他材料蒸制或烘烤而成的食品：年糕。蛋糕。绿豆糕。糕点。糕饼。

糕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāo］
［《集韻》居勞切，平，見。］
用米粉、麦粉、豆粉等制成的块状食品。

糕字的英文翻译

◎ 糕
cake

糕字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　糕； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页911第37
【集韻】居勞切，音羔。與餻同。糜也。【野客叢書】劉夢得嘗作《九日》詩，欲用糕字，思六經中無此字，遂止。故宋景文《九日》詩曰：劉郞不肯題糕字，虛負人生一世豪。【周禮·天官·籩人疏】羞邊之實，糗餌粉餈。註餅之曰餈。疏今之餈糕，六經中未嘗無糕。【松漠紀聞】金國重陽有寶階糕。

考證：〔【野客叢書】【周禮·天官·籩人疏】羞邊之實，糗餌粉餈。【鄭箋】今之餈糕，六經中未嘗無糕也。〕　謹照原文改：周禮籩人疏羞邊之實，糗餌粉餈。註餅之曰餈。疏今之餈糕，六經中未嘗無糕。
糕字的源字形

糕字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Uncollected first] [Rice character department] 　糕; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 911 37
[Jiyun] Ju Laoqie, sound lamb. Same as 餻. Mi also. [Yeke Series] Liu Mengde tried to write a poem "Nine Days". He wanted to use the word "cake", but there was no such word in the Six Classics of Thinking, so he stopped. Therefore, Song Jingwen’s "Nine Days" poem said: Liu Yin refused to write cakes, betraying his life. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Shu Ren Shu】The shame of the side is the real, embarrassing bait powder. Note that the cake is called glutinous rice. Shujin’s glutinous rice cakes are not without cakes in the six classics. 【Songmo Jiwen】Chongyang, Jin Country, has Baojie cakes. Textual research: [[Wild Guest Series] [Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Shu Ren Shu] The shame of the side, embarrassing bait powder. [Zheng Jian] Today’s glutinous rice cakes are not without cakes in the Six Classics. 〕 　 I would like to modify the original text: Zhou Lizhan people's shameless side is real, embarrassing bait powder. Note that the cake is called glutinous rice. Shujin’s glutinous rice cakes are not without cakes in the six classics.

Name meaning
Nothing.
形声字。米表意,其古文字形体像稻梗和米粒,表示糕是用米等粮食制成;羔(gao )表声,羔是小羊,有柔美意,表示糕
较柔软而味美。糕是用米粉或面粉制成的食品。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Рис означает, что его древние символы напоминают рисовые стебли и рисовые зерна, что указывает на то, что пирог сделан из зерен, таких как рис; баранина (гао) выражает звук, баранина - это баранина, с мягким и красивым значением, указывающим на то, что торт мягкий и вкусно.
Пироги - это продукты, приготовленные из рисовой муки или муки.
Продукты, приготовленные из рисовой муки или муки: ~ год заказа "яйца ~". ~ Торт ~ сухой лед ~ корыто ~ волосы ~ пчела ~ цветок ~ хризантема ~
